name: Install Sysmon
description: Install Sysmon on this machine. Will also install Chocolatey.

run.command: -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')); choco install sysmon -y; sysmon64 -accepteula -i
